title: Need anything from the shop?
Check the availability of your closest shops and pharmacies.
HeroSearch.description: Find everything you need and reduce unnecessary movements to risk areas.

HeroFeatures.title: A safer way to shop during quarantine
HeroFeatures.description: We want to reduce people’s exposure to the COVID-19 by letting everyone know whether the items they’re looking for are available in their nearest supermarket or not.

features.title: Explore your neighbourhood
features.description: Find supermarkets and pharmacies near your home that offer the products you need.

features.title: Plan ahead
features.description: Let us know the items that you need in and your location. We'll take care of the rest.

features.title: Go safely to the supermarket!
features.description: We'll let you know the best time to go so you can avoid the long lines and empty shelves.

features.title: Help your community
features.description: Update product availability levels from what you’ve seen at your local supermarket.

features.title: Unlock shiny rewards
features.description: Become a trusted contributor and gain badges by improving the accuracy of your supermarket shelf information.

HeroForm.title: A safer way to shop during quarantine
HeroForm.description: We want to reduce people’s exposure to the COVID-19 by letting people know whether the items they’re looking for are available in their nearest supermarket.
